text: Thomas Edward Llamas (born July 2, 1979) is an American journalist who currently works for NBC News. On March 5, 2025, it was announced that Llamas would be succeeding Lester Holt as anchor of NBC Nightly News. He worked for ABC News as the weekend anchor of ABC World News Tonight from 2014 until his last ABC broadcast being on January 31, 2021. Category:American journalists Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: Tom Llamas
